consentText.en: We use cookies to customize and improve the content shown to you, making sure you'll get the best online shopping experience. By clicking "Accept Cookies", we can continue to deliver personalized offers and inspiration, based on the things you like. We assure full confidentiality when handling and storing your personal data submitted on this site.

preferencesPopupIntroText.en: We use cookies to optimize website functionality, analyze the performance, and provide personalized experience to you. Some cookies are essential to make the website operate and function correctly. Those cookies cannot be disabled. In this window you can manage your preference of cookies.

accessSectionParagraphText.en: You have the right to request access to your data at any time.

rectificationSectionParagraphText.en: You have the right to request your data to be updated whenever you think it is appropriate.

erasureSectionParagraphText.en: You have the right to ask all your data to be erased. After that, you will no longer be able to access your account.

strictlyNecessaryCookiesDescriptionText.en: These cookies are essential in order to enable you to move around the website and use its features, such as accessing secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

functionalityCookiesDescriptionText.en: These cookies enable the site to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

performanceCookiesDescriptionText.en: These cookies enable us to monitor and improve the performance of our website. For example, they allow us to count visits, identify traffic sources and see which parts of the site are most popular.

targetingCookiesDescriptionText.en: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

unclassifiedCookiesDescriptionText.en: Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies.

guestsSupportInfoText.en: Please login with your customer account to further proceed.

guestsSupportEmailSuccessMessage.en: If you are registered as a customer of this store, you will soon receive an email with instructions on how to proceed.

guestsSupportEmailFailureMessage.en: Your request was not submitted. Please try again and if problem persists, contact store owner for assistance.

confirmationSuccessMessage.en: We will soon get back to you as to your request.

confirmationFailureMessage.en: Your request was not verified. Please try again and if problem persists, contact store owner for assistance

consentSectionNoConsentText.en: You have not consented to the cookies policy of this website.

consentSectionConsentedText.en: You consented to the cookies policy of this website on

rectificationCommentPlaceholder.en: Describe what you want to be updated

library.window: {{children}}

banner.extraCss: .cc-banner-logo {max-width: 24em!important;}    @media(min-width: 768px) {.cc-window.cc-floating{max-width: 24em!important;width: 24em!important;}}    .cc-message, .cc-header, .cc-logo {text-align: left}    .cc-window-wrapper{z-index: 2147483647;}    .cc-window{z-index: 2147483647;font-family: inherit;}    .cc-header{font-family: inherit;}    .pd-cp-ui{font-family: inherit; background-color: #FFFFFF;color:#000000;}    .pd-cp-btn{}    input + .pd-cp-preferences-slider{background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)}    .pd-cp-scrolling-section::-webkit-scrollbar{background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)}    input:checked + .pd-cp-preferences-slider{background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)}    .pd-cp-scrolling-section::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)}    .pd-cp-ui-close{color:#000000;}    .pd-cp-preferences-slider:before{background-color: #FFFFFF}    .pd-cp-title:before {border-color: #000000!important}    .pd-cp-preferences-slider{background-color:#000000}    .pd-cp-toggle{color:#000000!important}    @media(max-width:699px) {.pd-cp-ui-close-top svg {fill: #000000}}    .pd-cp-toggle:hover,.pd-cp-toggle:visited,.pd-cp-toggle:active{color:#000000!important}    .pd-cookie-banner-window {box-shadow: 0 0 18px rgb(0 0 0 / 20%);}  #pandectes-banner .cc-window{  border-radius: 12px 12px 0px 0px;  padding: 74px 44px 54px 42px;}#pandectes-banner .cc-close {    margin-left: unset;    position: absolute;    top: 20px;    color: transparent;    right: 28px;    background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0641/5613/9760/files/CLOSE_X_24PX.svg?v=1660752692);    background-size: cover;    background-repeat: no-repeat;    height: 24px;    width: 24px;}#pandectes-banner .cc-link{    position: absolute;    right: 0;    margin-top: 10px;    margin-right: 44px;    width: 314.49px;    height: 56px;    bottom: 54px;    text-decoration:none;}#pandectes-banner .cc-window.cc-floating {    max-width: 100%!important;    width: 100%!important;    display: flex;    flex-direction: row;    gap: 126px;    bottom:0;    left: 0;    min-height: 256px;}#pandectes-banner .cc-message {    font-family: 'CutiveMono-Regular';    margin-bottom: 0em;    display: flex;    align-items: center;    font-weight: 400;    font-size: 14px;    line-height: 24px;    letter-spacing: 0.02em;    padding-top: 10px;}#pandectes-banner .cc-compliance {    max-height: 56px;    min-width: 314px;}#pandectes-banner .cc-btn.cc-btn-decision{  height:100%;  width:100%;}#pandectes-banner a.cc-btn,#pandectes-banner a.cc-link{  font-family: 'CutiveMono-Regular';  border: 1px solid #000000;  border-radius: 3px;  display:flex;  align-items:center;  justify-content:center;  font-weight: 400;  font-size: 16px;  line-height: 24px;  letter-spacing: 0.02em;}#pandectes-banner .cc-header{  font-family: 'CutiveMono-Regular';     position:absolute;  top: 45px;  font-size: 24px;  line-height: 39px;  letter-spacing: 0.02em;  text-transform: uppercase;  font-weight: 400;}@media screen and (max-width:1170px){  #pandectes-banner .cc-window.cc-floating {    flex-direction: column;    min-height: 350px;    max-height: 80vh;    padding: 35px 35px 50px 35px;  }  #pandectes-banner .cc-message {    font-size: 12px;    line-height: 20px;    display: flex;    flex-direction: column;    position: absolute;    left: 0;    padding-left: 35px;    padding-right: 35px;    padding-top: 0;    bottom: 212px;}  #pandectes-banner .cc-close {    //top: 13px;    bottom:445px;    right: 13px;    height:16px;    width:16px;  }  #pandectes-banner .cc-window{    border-radius: 12px 12px 0px 0px;    padding: 74px 37px 50px 35px;  }  #pandectes-banner .cc-link {    left: 0;    width: 83%;    max-width: 100%;    margin: 0 auto;    bottom: -156px;  }  #pandectes-banner .cc-compliance {    height: 56px;    width: 100%;    position: absolute;    bottom: 126px;    max-width: 100%;    text-align: center;    left: 0;    margin: 0 auto;    align-items: center;    justify-content: center;    display: flex;  }  #pandectes-banner .cc-btn.cc-btn-decision {    max-width: 83%;  }  #pandectes-banner .cc-header {    top: 32px;    font-size: 15px;    line-height: 20px;    margin-bottom: 0;    position: absolute;  }  #pandectes-banner a.cc-btn, #pandectes-banner a.cc-link{    font-size: 14px;    line-height: 24px;  }}@media screen and (max-width:1024px) and (min-width:600px){  #pandectes-banner .cc-window.cc-floating {      min-height: 360px;     }}@media screen and (max-width:650px) and (min-width:600px){  #pandectes-banner .cc-window.cc-floating.cc-window.cc-floating {      min-height: 390px;     }}@media screen and (max-width:600px){  #pandectes-banner .cc-window.cc-floating {    min-height: 474px;    box-sizing:border-box;  }   #pandectes-banner .cc-header {    bottom: 422px;    top: unset;  }}
